segments.text: Hey . Why did you take that money ? You are such a cheater ! I should send you to jail !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not cheating . When you pass go , you collect $ 200 , Everyone knows that !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well you can ’ t just take the money . You have to ask the bank for money . And I ’ m the banker .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Here you are , $ 200 , Thank you , please come again ! Now it ’ s my turn to roll the dice .
segments.speaker: S1
